annotation.spannedText: Even if you think your child has already had one of these diseases, your child should still have MMR immunisation

classMention.mentionClass: Even if you think your child has already had one of these diseases, your child should still have MMR immunisation

annotation.spannedText: Serious problems with the MMR vaccine are extremely rare

classMention.mentionClass: Serious problems with the MMR vaccine are extremely rare

annotation.spannedText: Most children are perfectly well after having a dose of measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Most children are perfectly well after having a dose of measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Also, you should not become pregnant for one month after having a rubella (MMR) immunisation

classMention.mentionClass: Also, you should not become pregnant for one month after having a rubella (MMR) immunisation

annotation.spannedText: It is safe, however, to have if you are breast-feeding

classMention.mentionClass: It is safe, however, to have if you are breast-feeding

annotation.spannedText: If you are seriously ill (for example, if you have a severe infection) you should postpone the vaccine until you are better

classMention.mentionClass: If you are seriously ill (for example, if you have a severe infection) you should postpone the vaccine until you are better

annotation.spannedText: Large studies have all concluded that there is no evidence to link MMR immunisation to either of these conditions

classMention.mentionClass: Large studies have all concluded that there is no evidence to link MMR immunisation to either of these conditions

annotation.spannedText: This is due to some children not receiving the measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: This is due to some children not receiving the measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Since rubella immunisation was introduced in 1970 there has been a dramatic fall in the number of babies born with the congenital rubella syndrome

classMention.mentionClass: Since rubella immunisation was introduced in 1970 there has been a dramatic fall in the number of babies born with the congenital rubella syndrome

annotation.spannedText: Rubella is now a very uncommon infection in the UK as a result of the vaccination programme

classMention.mentionClass: Rubella is now a very uncommon infection in the UK as a result of the vaccination programme
